title: Ep186: Male Bisexuality & a Pillow Case Feat Redd the Model
itunes:title: Ep186: Male Bisexuality & a Pillow Case Feat Redd the Model
description:
This week's episode we get into male bi-sexuality with Redd the Model. This episode starts with a catchup on the duos relationship woes and how quarantine has impacted their dating lives. This week's vanilla sh-t touches on bisexual rap lyrics and how the recent trend of artists opening up about their sexual preferences has an impact on the bisexual community as it pertains to black men. This week's whorederve tells you to keep things close to the bed before we dive into the Whoreible Decision of being bisexual as a black man in today's society. Our guest Redd opens up about realizing his sexuality, coming out to his parents and partners and how he has learned to love himself despite societies' narratives. Follow this week's guest on social media: @reddthemodel This week's episode is brought to you by: Adam & Eve: Use Promocode "WD50" and get 50% off almost any one item PLUS Free Shipping Dipsea: Go to dispseastories.com/whoreible and use promo code "WHOREIBLE" and get a 30 day FREE trial with Dipsea Join the RedPanda Stock Club now and save 50% off membership: https://joinredpanda.samcart.com/products/wd50/ All caught up? Become a patron now and get 3 bonus episodes every month! Sign up at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions This week's bonus clip comes from: BonusEp47: The Pleasure Coach & the M Word feat LT
